name: stock_app
description: web  based  stock  portfolio  app, for the  purpose  of  this  exercise  a  stock  is  simply  an  asset  that  can  be  bought  or  sold(like  a  house)  at  a  price  that  continuously  rises  and  falls  throughout  the  day.
